title: TRANSFER WE1 FPS/FPC FILES TO CMS - EBANKING - DOCUMENTUM - TARIF - IMTF
time_sequence: CD - DATA RECONCILIATION AND TRANSMISSION TO SATELLITES

task_list.instruction_title:
Make the following FPS/FPC files available to satellite applications in the respective folder/server :

Documentum - \\[corp.ubp.ch](http://corp.ubp.ch/)\sfs$\S-Groups\VICTORIA_Documentum

eBanking - \\[corp.ubp.ch](http://corp.ubp.ch)\sfs$\S-Groups\VICTORIA_Secret\ebanking\

TARIF - \\[corp.ubp.ch](http://corp.ubp.ch)\sfs$\S-Groups\VICTORIA_Information_Technology\TARIF_FILES

CMS - \\[corp.ubp.ch](http://corp.ubp.ch)\sfs$\S-Groups\VICTORIA_Secret\CMS\

TAX - \\[corp.ubp.ch](http://corp.ubp.ch)\sfs$\S-Groups\VICTORIA_Confidential\Tax\

Compliance/IMTF - \\[corp.ubp.ch](http://corp.ubp.ch/)\sfs$\S-Groups\VICTORIA_Secret\Compliance\

Specicred (Frédéric T.) - \\[corp.ubp.ch](http://corp.ubp.ch/)\sfs$\S-Groups\VICTORIA_Secret\Specicred\

ODS (Blaise G.) - \\[corp.ubp.ch](http://corp.ubp.ch/)\sfs$\S-Groups\VICTORIA_Confidential\ODS\
